message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $20,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $12,000 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking $14,000 is a fair price. Would you be willing to accept this?
